thread.title: OMG! Shah Rukh Khan is Bigg Boss 9 contestant, host Salman Khan clarifies
thread.title_full: OMG! Shah Rukh Khan is Bigg Boss 9 contestant, host Salman Khan clarifies

author: Rashmi Mishra | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: OMG! Shah Rukh Khan is Bigg Boss 9 contestant, host Salman Khan clarifies
text:
OMG! Shah Rukh Khan is Bigg Boss 9 contestant, host Salman Khan clarifies By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 11, 2015 at 11:30 PM Comments We knew about Bigg Boss host Salman Khan inviting good friend and superstar Shah Rukh Khan on the Bigg Boss 9 show to promote his films. But we never thought Shah Rukh will end up being one of the participants on the BB 9 Double Trouble house. Well, don’t ponder much as King Khan is not one of the fourteen contestants but he was definitely an integral part during Bigg Boss 9 Premiere. Also Read: Bigg Boss 9 Final List of Confirmed Contestants Out: Salman Khan’s reality show participants promise ‘Double Trouble’! The celebrity list this year is a mix of known faces and some new found talents. It was here when Salman Khan created quite some stir when he introduced our beloved King Khan, Shah Rukh Khan, as one of the contestants. Also Read: Bigg Boss 9 Double Trouble: What is BB 9 house ‘Double Trouble’ concept all about? Fans were all glee and surprised by this revelation, however their hearts were broken all too soon. While Shar Rukh Khan’s still from Om Shanti Om was used to introduce a contestant, the contestant was Yuvika Chaudhary, the girl who was part of the Farah Khan directed 2007 blockbuster. It was very pleasant to see Salman be all praise and appreciative while describing SRK, instead of taking a dig at him as usual. The new season of Bigg Boss is stirring up quite some drama in the beginning. Also Read: Bigg Boss 9 house leaked pictures: See Salman Khan’s exclusive ‘Double Trouble’ Bigg Boss house! Salman Khan had earlier said that Shah Rukh is more than welcome on Bigg Boss 9 house to promote his upcoming movie ‘Dilwale’. He had said, “I would love him to come and he knows I mean it. If he has the time and wants to come on to the show, he is more than welcome to come and spend some time with the contestants.” Wow, we hope to see SRK on show soon. 
  12, 2015 12:31 AM Topics:
